ActionListener

Class ConnectionActionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ActionListener.ConnectionActionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ConnectionActionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The class ConnectionActionListener is the event controller of the class ConnectionView.

    This class controls all the actions performed by the different JComponents added in the layout of the ConnectionView class.

    Version:
    v0.1 03/13/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionActionListener

        public ConnectionActionListener(MainFrame main_frame,
                        ConnectionView connection_view,
                        ExecutionView execution_view,
                        ConnectionClient connection_client)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        main_frame - main JFrame for the application. Necessary to be able to change the different layouts.
        connection_view - view of the JPanel used to show the connection options.
        execution_view - view of the JPanel used to show the execution.
        connection_client - instance of the class that manages the connection with the server.
